A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Horrible! This was so disappointing! I would definitely not recommend this movie\, save your money! The story line was so disconnected \, who is that person? Why is this happening? What??? If you haven't see the previous movie a lot of this made no sense. A movie should stand on its own with a story line that makes sense. This movie does not. Battle scenes that go on and just seem like a rehash from earlier Star Wars movie. It was too long\, incoherent and stupid.
